t: Amazon Go is a new kind of corner store
s: Amazon Go is a new kind of store featuring the world’s most advanced shopping technology. No lines, no checkout – just grab and go! Watch the video: amazon.com/go

2 weeks ago - Amazon described Go stores to have used several technologies, including computer vision, deep learning algorithms, and sensor fusion for the purchase, checkout, and payment steps associated with a retail transaction which was later revealed to be done remotely by a team of people in India.

t: Amazon Go, the cashierless retail store of the future, has some new competition
